dcterms:creator: De Calmes, M.
Perennou, G.
dcterms:description: A lexical database developed at IRIT, containing lexical, phonological, and morphological information. It includes grapheme, pronunciation, morphosyntactic traits, canonical form, and frequency indicators. The corpus is split into training, development, and test sets for phonetic conversion tasks.
dcterms:title: BDLex

dcterms:description: A corpus of 3,500 proper names, each with grapheme, phonetic transcriptions, and origin tags. Used for testing and training in proper name phonetic conversion and origin detection tasks.
dcterms:title: NP-Lor
